snippet: Simeon Hamilton announced himself as a possible medal contender for the Sochi Olympics by winning a men’s freestyle cross-country sprint in the Tour de Ski.
abstract: Simeon Hamilton announces himself as possible medal contender for Sochi Olympics by winning a men’s freestyle cross-country sprint in Tour de Ski; Shani Davis and Heather Richardson sharpen their Sochi credentials by winning 1,500 meters at United States speedskating trials in Kearns, Utah.
lead_paragraph: Simeon Hamilton announced himself as a possible medal contender for the Sochi Olympics by winning a men’s freestyle cross-country sprint in the Tour de Ski.

headline.main: Hamilton Wins Sprint at Tour de Ski
